title: Create Cargo project structure
close_reason: Created Cargo project structure with all modules, build.rs, and options.proto. Build passes with #![deny(warnings)] and #![deny(missing_docs)].

title: Define seaorm/options.proto extensions
close_reason: Defined seaorm/options.proto with MessageOptions and FieldOptions extensions including: table_name, indexes, skip, primary_key, auto_increment, unique, nullable, column_name, column_type, default_value, and all relation types (has_one, has_many, belongs_to, has_many_via).

title: Add enum support for SeaORM entity generation
description:
Generate SeaORM-compatible enum types from protobuf enum definitions. This includes:
1. Generating Rust enums with DeriveActiveEnum
2. Mapping protobuf enum fields to the generated enum types
3. Supporting enum options for customization (e.g., db representation)
close_reason: Implemented enum support: EnumOptions/EnumValueOptions parsing, enum code generation with DeriveActiveEnum, support for string and integer db types, unit and integration tests.

title: Implement relation code generation
close_reason: Implemented relation code generation in src/codegen/relation.rs. Supports HasOne, HasMany, BelongsTo relations with configurable from/to columns, and many-to-many via junction tables. Includes unit tests.

title: Implement plugin entry point (stdin/stdout)
close_reason: Implemented plugin entry point in src/main.rs that reads CodeGeneratorRequest from stdin, calls protoc_gen_seaorm::generate(), and writes CodeGeneratorResponse to stdout following the protoc plugin protocol.

title: Implement proto to SeaORM type mapping
close_reason: Implemented proto to SeaORM type mapping in src/types.rs with MappedType struct, map_proto_type function covering all primitive types, and smart inference for well-known types (Timestamp->DateTimeUtc, Duration->TimeDelta, Date, wrapper types). Includes unit tests.

title: Add oneof support for SeaORM entity generation
description:
Handle protobuf oneof fields in entity generation. Options include:
1. Generate separate nullable columns for each oneof variant
2. Generate a Rust enum with JSON serialization
3. Add oneof options to control the mapping strategy
close_reason: Implemented oneof support with three strategies: flatten (nullable columns), json (JSON column), and tagged (discriminator + value columns). Integrated with entity generation, added unit and integration tests.

title: Implement entity code generation
close_reason: Implemented entity code generation in src/codegen/entity.rs. Generates SeaORM 2.0 DeriveEntityModel structs with proper attributes (primary_key, unique, column_name, column_type, default_value). Handles type mapping, nullable fields, and code formatting via prettyplease.

title: Add integration tests
close_reason: Added integration tests in tests/integration.rs. Tests cover: entity generation with proper attributes, skipping messages without seaorm options, and skipping explicitly skipped messages. Also added test fixtures in tests/fixtures/.

title: Implement options parsing from descriptors
close_reason: Implemented options parsing from descriptors using uninterpreted_option field. Handles both aggregate values (text format) and individual field settings. Parses all MessageOptions and FieldOptions fields.
